page.shortlink: api a5 css def editor function source
page.description: CSS style builder. (selectors = class name, css = css code string, image_list = optional list of images for the user to pick from, relative_img_dir = optional location which the style builder should assume it is at, return_cancel = optional return text "<CANCEL>" when user cancels)
page.prototype: C a5_css_def_editor(C selectors ,C css [,C image_list [,C relative_img_dir [,L return_cancel [,* opsIn ]]]])
